metadata.title: GAIDN - Global AI Developer Network
metadata.description: A GitHub-based AI developer network platform dedicated to building a free, collaborative, and transparent developer ecosystem.
metadata.keywords: AI, developers, GitHub, network, collaboration, open source

user.profile_not_found_description: Sorry, the user you are looking for does not exist or has been deleted.

hero.title: GAIDN
hero.subtitle: Global AI Developer Network
hero.description: A GitHub-based AI developer network platform dedicated to building a free, collaborative, and transparent developer ecosystem. Connect global AI developers and drive technological progress and innovation together.

features.title: Core Features
features.description: GAIDN provides a trusted, transparent, and free collaboration platform for global AI developers through advanced technical architecture and open philosophy.

github_auth.title: GitHub Authentication
github_auth.description: One-click login with GitHub account, building a trusted community network based on real developer identity.

developer_profile.title: Developer Profile
developer_profile.description: Display personal data based on GitHub data, including project contributions, technology stack, and community activity.

community_leaderboard.title: Community Leaderboard
community_leaderboard.description: Discover outstanding AI developers with an open and transparent ranking system based on multi-dimensional evaluation.

developer_network.title: Developer Network
developer_network.description: Build a developer network not controlled by a single platform, ensuring data freedom.

transparency.title: Open and Transparent
transparency.description: All data and algorithms are open and transparent, with democratic community governance, giving every developer a voice.

free_collaboration.title: Free Collaboration
free_collaboration.description: Promote free collaboration among developers and jointly drive the development and innovation of AI technology.

leaderboard_section.title: GAIDN Developer Leaderboard
leaderboard_section.description: A multi-dimensional evaluation system based on GitHub data, showcasing the technical strength and community contributions of global AI developers. Transparent and open ranking algorithms ensure every developer receives fair recognition.

cta.title: Join GAIDN Community
cta.description: Join our developer network immediately, connect with global AI developers, and jointly drive the future of technological innovation.
cta.bottom_text: Join us and build the future with the world's top AI developers

page.title: Developer Leaderboard
page.description: Discover outstanding AI developers, ranked by score

messages.no_data: No leaderboard data available. Please ensure users have completed score calculation.

configuration_error.title: Configuration Error
configuration_error.description: Authentication service configuration error, please contact the system administrator.

access_denied.title: Access Denied
access_denied.description: You do not have permission to access this application.

verification_failed.title: Verification Failed
verification_failed.description: The verification link is invalid or expired, please try again.

login_failed.title: Login Failed
login_failed.description: An error occurred during login, possibly due to database connection issues or server busy. Please try again later.

unknown_error.title: Unknown Error
unknown_error.description: An unknown error occurred, please try again later or contact the support team.

error.contact_support: If the problem persists, please contact technical support
